interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mineral Sheer Tint Foundation Spf 20, New Makeup Tinted Moisturizer (Natural Glow) - 1 fl oz
Review Date: 2022/01/30
Store: Beauty Basics
Product Description: ['SPF 20. Hypoallergenic. Clinically engineered to multi-task as a foundation, sunscreen and antioxidant lotion. This ultra-sheer crème features an extra boost - our Multi-Mineral Complex of Magnesium, Potassium, Sodium, Zinc, Lysine and other vital elements. Potent antioxidants, Ginkgo Biloba, Ginseng and Vitamins A and E, protect against free radical damage while moisturizing skin. Glides on effortlessly to create a water-resistant veil of natural-looking coverage.']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Color': 'Natural Glow', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Brand': 'Beauty Basics', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.01 x 5.91 x 0.98 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B008FR532U_US', 'UPC': '025132912731', 'Manufacturer': 'Your Name cosmetics'}
Review Text: Evens out complexion.
Review Title: Produces natural glow on face.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mineral Sheer Tint Foundation Spf 20, New Makeup Tinted Moisturizer (Natural Glow) - 1 fl oz
Beauty Basics
['SPF 20. Hypoallergenic. Clinically engineered to multi-task as a foundation, sunscreen and antioxidant lotion. This ultra-sheer crème features an extra boost - our Multi-Mineral Complex of Magnesium, Potassium, Sodium, Zinc, Lysine and other vital elements. Potent antioxidants, Ginkgo Biloba, Ginseng and Vitamins A and E, protect against free radical damage while moisturizing skin. Glides on effortlessly to create a water-resistant veil of natural-looking coverage.']

Evens out complexion.
Produces natural glow on face.
